Title: Relates to exempting school bus operators from sales tax for equipment and fuel used in operation of a school bus
Summary: Provides certain school bus operators with a refund or credit of sales and compensating use taxes on the purchase of school buses and equipment and fuel used in the operation of a school bus.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing certain school bus operators with a refund or credit of sales and compensating use taxes on the purchase of school buses and equipment and fuel used in the operation of a school bus
